meanings.sent1: The predraft meeting helped us plan our project before starting.
meanings.sent2: The team discussed predraft ideas to organize their thoughts.
meanings.sent3: The predraft checklist made sure everything was in place before the big meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her predraft sketches laid the foundation for the final artwork.
meanings.sent5: The predraft outline was like a roadmap for the entire project.

meanings.definition: To prepare or plan before drafting.
meanings.sent1: They predraft their speeches to ensure they cover all key points.
meanings.sent2: She predrafts her essays to have a clear structure before writing.
meanings.sent3: He predrafts his schedule to make sure he doesn't forget any tasks.
meanings.sent4: Predrafting the blueprint helped avoid mistakes during construction.
meanings.sent5: The team predrafts their game plan to strategize effectively.
